last_episode_to_air.name: My Wife's Male Friend; Party Time
last_episode_to_air.overview: Seok gets jealous after hearing that Ae-bong had a close male friend in high school; Yul's first birthday party gets out of control.

name: The Sound of Your Heart: Reboot
overview: Based on the longest-running web-based comic series "Ma Eum Ui Sori" in Korea, "Sound of your heart" is a story about Cho Seok, an aspiring comic writer, and his strange family.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: With their daughter Yul-bong at home, Seok can hardly concentrate on his work and decides to work in Bu-ook's car where he gets stuck.; Ae-bong's mom gets lasik surgery and is unable to see following the procedure. Seok takes her around on piggyback for the next few days.

episodes.name: The World Created by Cho Seok; Paper Human
episodes.overview: Seok’s loved ones may be eccentric, but his cartoon world couldn’t exist without them; Seok moves to a new place that’s rife with problems.

episodes.name: Mother Scrooge; How-Tos of a Long-Term Relationship
episodes.overview: Seok's dad needs his sons’ help getting rid of an old sofa against his wife's wishes; Seok plans an event for Ae-bong to spice up the relationship.

episodes.name: 3 Idiots; How Cho Copes with a Slump
episodes.overview: Ae-bong wonders when Seok and his friends will finally grow up; Seok searches desperately for inspiration to overcome a case of "webtoonist's block."

episodes.name: War of Blind Dates; The Girlfriend's Assist
episodes.overview: Seok and Ae-bong agree to battle it out to see whose friends are superior; Ae-bong quits her job and appoints herself as Seok's full-time assistant.

episodes.name: Fluorescent Man; Doll Addiction
episodes.overview: Ae-bong invites Seok over when her parents go out for the night; Jun's determination to beat the claw crane game puts him in a tight spot.

episodes.name: A Moment to Remember; A Debt of Wishes
episodes.overview: Seok hits his head while drunk and loses his memory; Seok’s incentive for Ae-bong to raise her test score doesn’t go as intended.

episodes.name: Wannabe YOLO; Glorious Revenge
episodes.overview: Wanting a YOLO lifestyle, Seok's dad schemes to put his own restaurant out of business; Jun switches his cheap appliances with Seok's expensive ones.

episodes.name: Should I Say I Love You Again; Wedding Warrior Aebong Peach
episodes.overview: Thinking his dream was a good omen, Seok tries his luck at the lottery; Seok’s hectic work schedule prompts Ae-bong to consider proposing to him.

episodes.name: The Day After the Break-up; Meet the Chos and Chois
episodes.overview: Feeling miserable, Seok accidentally eats shrimp despite being allergic; Ae-bong's and Seok's parents try to impress one another at a formal dinner.

episodes.name: A Bloody Fan Meet; My Beloved Ae-bongs
episodes.overview: Ae-bong organizes Seok's first fan meet-and-greet; Seok goes all out to surprise Ae-bong with a marriage proposal, but things don’t go as planned.

episodes.name: Space Creation; Can't See Squat
episodes.overview: Unable to work at home due to the baby, Seok looks for another space; Seok starts giving piggyback rides to Ae-bong's mom after she gets eye surgery.

episodes.name: War of the In-laws; Your Mom Used to Be Fit
episodes.overview: The two grandfathers get competitive about Yul and battle it out over who’s number one; Ae-bong tries dieting to shed her post-pregnancy weight.

episodes.name: A Battle Against Myself; The Unbearable Weight of Dating a Cop
episodes.overview: After learning that someone’s been impersonating him, Seok tries to convince fans that he’s the real Seok; Ae-bong introduces Jun to her cop friend.

episodes.name: Protagonist; Limited Edition
episodes.overview: Ae-bong decides to help Seok’s dad through male menopause; Ae-bong gets Seok a present that turns out to be more popular than she'd realized.

episodes.name: Sweet Honeymoon; The Night of The Living Cold
episodes.overview: Ae-bong makes changes around the house to revive the romance; The men in the family try to get sick when Seok’s mother announces a big cleaning day.

episodes.name: Baby & Me; Neighborhood Watch
episodes.overview: While babysitting Yul, Jun panics when she goes missing; Ae-bong's dad drags Seok and his friends into his neighborhood watch patrol.

episodes.name: Forgetful Mom; Surprise Party
episodes.overview: Ae-bong vows to never let her absent-minded mom babysit for Yul; Seok's secret plan to attend a cosplay festival leads to a big family mix-up.

episodes.name: I'll Be Your Celebrity; A Rare Anus
episodes.overview: Sick with a cold, Seok gets mistaken for an idol star when he goes out in a face mask, hat and sunglasses; Seok gets toy robot parts stuck to his body.

episodes.name: Hectic Nursing; Scouter
episodes.overview: Feeling unappreciated by her sons, Seok's mom decides to feign illness; Seok quits his job on a whim when he gets a tempting offer elsewhere.

episodes.name: My Wife's Male Friend; Party Time
episodes.overview: Seok gets jealous after hearing that Ae-bong had a close male friend in high school; Yul's first birthday party gets out of control.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: With their daughter Yul-bong at home, Seok can hardly concentrate on his work and decides to work in Bu-ook's car where he gets stuck.; Ae-bong's mom gets lasik surgery and is unable to see following the procedure. Seok takes her around on piggyback for the next few days.
